 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁ֫יִשׁ‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==alabaster== (foreign word? Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שַׁיְשָׁא‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, perhaps Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šaššu***</u></abbr> ); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַבְנֵישֿׁ‎</span> [[1Chr.29.2|1Chr 29:2]] (material of temple); compare Patrick<sup>Hast. DB MARBLE</sup>.
